Class ContractorBrokerApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • ContractorBrokerApp

  • public class ContractorBrokerApp
extends java.lang.Object
    The ContractorBrokerApp implements the main method for starting the Contractor Brokerage application.
    Since:
    1.1
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Augustine Ogundimu

      private static void initiateLoggers(AppConfigManager acm)
      This method is called by the main method for the configuration and initialization of all base loggers used in the Contractor Brokerage application.
      static void main(java.lang.String... args)
      This is the starting point for the Contractor Brokerage application - the main method.

    • Method Detail

      • initiateLoggers

        private static void initiateLoggers(AppConfigManager acm)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        This method is called by the main method for the configuration and initialization of all base loggers used in the Contractor Brokerage application.
        Parameters:
        acm - A reference to the AppConfigManager object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - is thrown if there are issues accessing the properties or log file.
        See Also:
        AppConfigManager

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String... args)
        This is the starting point for the Contractor Brokerage application - the main method.
        Parameters:
        args - Array of String objects denoting the command line arguments
